Translations.Text: velev `alime-llahu fihim hayral leesme`ahum. velev esme`ahum letevellev vehum mu`ridun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu-stecibu lillahi velirrasuli iza de`akum lima yuhyikum. va`lemu enne-llahe yehulu beyne-lmer'i vekalbihi veennehu ileyhi tuhserun
vetteku fitnetel la tusibenne-llezine zalemu minkum hassah. va`lemu enne-llahe sedidu-l`ikab
vezkuru iz entum kalilum mustad`afune fi-l'ardi tehafune ey yetehattafekumu-nnasu feavakum veeyyedekum binasrihi verazekakum mine-ttayyibati le`allekum teskurun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu la tehunu-llahe verrasule vetehunu emanatikum veentum ta`lemun
va`lemu ennema emvalukum veevladukum fitnetuv veenne-llahe `indehu ecrun `azim
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu in tetteku-llahe yec`al lekum furkanev veyukeffir `ankum seyyiatikum veyagfir lekum. vellahu zu-lfadli-l`azim
veiz yemkuru bike-llezine keferu liyusbituke ev yaktuluke ev yuhricuk. veyemkurune veyemkuru-llah. vellahu hayru-lmakirin
veiza tutla `aleyhim ayatuna kalu kad semi`na lev nesau lekulna misle haza in haza illa esatiru-l'evvelin
veiz kalu-llahumme in kane haza huve-lhakka min `indike feemtir `aleyna hicaratem mine-ssemai evi-'tina bi`azabin elim
vema kane-llahu liyu`azzibehum veente fihim. vema kane-llahu mu`azzibehum vehum yestagfirun
vema lehum ella yu`azzibehumu-llahu vehum yesuddune `ani-lmescidi-lharami vema kanu evliyah. in evliyauhu ille-lmuttekune velakinne ekserahum la ya`lemun
vema kane salatuhum `inde-lbeyti illa mukaev vetasdiyeh. fezuku-l`azabe bima kuntum tekfurun
inne-llezine keferu yunfikune emvalehum liyesuddu `an sebili-llah. feseyunfikuneha summe tekunu `aleyhim hasraten summe yuglebun. vellezine keferu ila cehenneme yuhserun
liyemize-llahu-lhabise mine-ttayyibi veyec`ale-lhabise ba`dahu `ala ba`din feyerkumehu cemi`an feyec`alehu fi cehennem. ulaike humu-lhasirun
kul lillezine keferu iy yentehu yugfer lehum ma kad selef. veiy ye`udu fekad medat sunnetu-l'evvelin
vekatiluhum hatta la tekune fitnetuv veyekune-ddinu kulluhu lillah. feini-ntehev feinne-llahe bima ya`melune besir
vein tevellev fa`lemu enne-llahe mevlakum. ni`me-lmevla veni`me-nnesir
